# Your output
- Your job is to only work with .html, .css or .js files.
- Do not use or suggest working with python, command line or other tools.
- Do not suggest how to test the website, or how to check it.
- Do not suggest next steps, verification summaries, or what you did.
- When you are done, simply write "done" without further clarification.

# Website
- Do not use external frameworks or libraries.
- Use simple and clean solutions.
